gdpr_compliance_test.body:
{"instruction": "Analyse the feature artifact and decide if geo-specific compliance logic is needed. Explain why and cite the relevant regulation if any.", "input": "Feature Name: EU Cookie Consent Banner
Feature Description: Display cookie consent banner for EU users accessing the website with options to accept or reject non-essential cookies for analytics and marketing purposes.

Law Context (structured JSON):
[{"law": "GDPR Article 7", "jurisdiction": "EU", "requirement": "Valid consent for data processing"}, {"law": "GDPR Article 6", "jurisdiction": "EU", "requirement": "Lawful basis for processing personal data"}]"}

ccpa_compliance_test.body:
{"instruction": "Analyse the feature artifact and decide if geo-specific compliance logic is needed. Explain why and cite the relevant regulation if any.", "input": "Feature Name: California Do Not Sell My Personal Information Button
Feature Description: Provides California residents with a prominent button to opt-out of the sale of their personal information as required by state privacy law.

Law Context (structured JSON):
[{"law": "CCPA Section 1798.135", "jurisdiction": "US-CA", "requirement": "Right to opt-out of sale of personal information"}, {"law": "CCPA Section 1798.100", "jurisdiction": "US-CA", "requirement": "Right to know about personal information collected"}]"}

sox_financial_test.body:
{"instruction": "Analyse the feature artifact and decide if geo-specific compliance logic is needed. Explain why and cite the relevant regulation if any.", "input": "Feature Name: Financial Transaction Audit Logger
Feature Description: Comprehensive logging system that tracks all financial transactions, database changes, and user access for compliance auditing in US public companies.

Law Context (structured JSON):
[{"law": "SOX Section 404", "jurisdiction": "US", "requirement": "Internal controls over financial reporting"}, {"law": "SOX Section 302", "jurisdiction": "US", "requirement": "Corporate responsibility for financial reports"}]"}

mixed_jurisdiction_test.body:
{"instruction": "Analyse the feature artifact and decide if geo-specific compliance logic is needed. Explain why and cite the relevant regulation if any.", "input": "Feature Name: Global User Data Processing Platform
Feature Description: Centralized platform for processing user data with automatic geo-location detection and region-specific privacy controls for users in EU, California, and other jurisdictions.
